features: A checklist to organize your launches in steps
Easy overview of the entire launch process

enhancedContent.overview: A comprehensive Notion-based checklist system designed to guide entrepreneurs and creators through successful Product Hunt launches. This structured template breaks down the complex launch process into manageable steps, helping users maximize their chances of achieving top rankings and better results.
problemsSolved: Feeling overwhelmed by the complexity of Product Hunt launches
Missing crucial steps in the launch preparation process
Struggling to organize and prioritize launch activities effectively
solutionsBenefits: Provides a clear, actionable roadmap for successful launches
Eliminates guesswork with proven step-by-step guidance
Increases launch success rates through systematic preparation
idealFor: First-time Product Hunt launchers seeking guidance
Startup founders preparing for major launches
notRecommendedFor: Experienced launchers with established systems (may be too basic)
Users seeking automated launch tools (this is a manual checklist)
whatsIncluded: Complete Product Hunt launch checklist template

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Notion template can be fully customized to match your specific launch needs and workflow preferences.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this template works with any Notion plan and doesn't require AI features to function effectively.

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?
faqs.answer: Very straightforward - simply duplicate the template to your Notion workspace and start following the checklist items.

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: The template reflects current Product Hunt best practices, though you should verify any platform-specific details for the latest requirements.

faqs.question: What if I need help?
faqs.answer: The creator offers support through multiple channels including Twitter, Reddit, Instagram, and email with typical response times of a few hours.
